entries.text: 阿卡姆被烏默爾多斯吞噬。
麗塔不得不去找別的幫手。
向烏默爾多斯獻祭了麗塔·錢德勒。
調查員擊退烏默爾多斯。
歐巴尼恩幫對調查員不滿。
調查員關上了現實的縫隙。

調查員未取得死靈之書。

沒有猶格·索托斯之子逃跑。
塞拉斯·畢曉普恢復原形。
調查員們昏迷了數小時。
調查員解救了沃倫·萊斯教授。
沃倫·萊斯教授在敦威治事件中存活。
猶格·索托斯將所有世界的間隔撕裂，一切變為一個原點。
猶格·索托斯將所有世界的間隔撕裂，一切變為一個原點。
猶格·索托斯逃往了另一個次元。
西布倫·沃特雷在敦威治事件中存活。

entries.masculine_text: #name# read Act 2 of The King in Yellow.
entries.feminine_text: #name# read Act 2 of The King in Yellow.

entries.text: the investigators were attacked as they escaped the Asylum.
the realm of Carcosa merged with our own, and Hastur rules over them both.
you chose not to go to the police.
you did not escape the gaze of the phantom.
you entered the catacombs on your own.
the followers of the sign have found the way forward.
Hastur has you in his grasp.
you intruded on a secret meeting.
you know the site of the gate.
you left the onyx clasp behind.
the police are suspicious of you.
the investigators prevented Hastur from escaping his prison.
you slayed the monsters at the dinner party.
the Stranger is on to you.
you tried to warn the police.
you were unable to find Nigel.
one or more investigators was possessed.

entries.feminine_text: #name# read Act 2 of The King in Yellow.

entries.text: the investigators were attacked as they escaped the Asylum.
the realm of Carcosa merged with our own, and Hastur rules over them both.
you chose not to go to the police.
you did not escape the gaze of the phantom.
you entered the catacombs on your own.
the followers of the sign have found the way forward.
Hastur has you in his grasp.
you intruded on a secret meeting.
you know the site of the gate.
you left the onyx clasp behind.
the police are suspicious of you.
the investigators prevented Hastur from escaping his prison.
you slayed the monsters at the dinner party.
the Stranger is on to you.
you tried to warn the police.
you were unable to find Nigel.
one or more investigators was possessed.
Alejandro followed the investigators into the ruins.
Alejandro is continuing his research on his own.
Alejandro recovered the Relic of Ages.
Alejandro chose to remain at camp.
the investigators cleared a path to the Eztli ruins.
the investigators cooperated with the Yithians.
the investigators have earned Alejandro’s trust.
the investigators have earned Ichtaca’s trust.
the fabric of time is unwoven.
the investigators fell into the depths.
the investigators forged a bond with Ichtaca.
you are forging your own path.
the investigators found the missing relic.
the investigators gave custody of the relic to Alejandro.
the investigators gave custody of the relic to Harlan Earnstone.
the investigators had their memories expunged.
the Harbinger is still alive (#X# damage).
Ichtaca is wary of the investigators.
Ichtaca observed your progress with keen interest.
the investigators recovered the Relic of Ages.
the investigators saved the civilization of the Serpents.
the investigators saved the civilization of the Yithians.
the investigators mapped out the way forward.
the investigators mended the tear in time.
the investigators recruited the help of another expedition.
the investigators sealed the Relic of Ages forever.
the investigators were forced to wait for additional supplies.

supplies.name: Sticky Goop
supplies.description: A mysterious scepter you found in a subterranean swamp.

supplies.name: Mysterious Scepter
supplies.description: A mysterious scepter you found in the throne room.

supplies.name: Key of Eztli
supplies.description: The Key of Eztli.

supplies.name: Gasoline
supplies.description: Enough for a long journey bycar.

supplies.name: Provisions
supplies.description: Food and water for one person. A must-have for any journey.

supplies.name: Medicine
supplies.description: To stave off disease, infection, or venom.

supplies.name: Pendant
supplies.description: Useless, but fond memories bring comfort to travelers far from home.

supplies.name: Canteen
supplies.description: Can be refilled at streams and rivers.

supplies.name: Compass
supplies.description: Can guide you when you are hopelessly lost.

supplies.name: Pickaxe
supplies.description: For breaking apart rocky surfaces.

supplies.name: Blanket
supplies.description: For warmth at night.

supplies.name: Chalk
supplies.description: For writing on rough stone surfaces.

supplies.name: Binoculars
supplies.description: To help you see faraway places.

supplies.name: Pocketknife
supplies.description: Too small to be used as a reliable weapon, but easily concealed.

supplies.name: Torches
supplies.description: Can light up dark areas, or set sconces alight.

supplies.name: Rope
supplies.description: Several long coils of strong rope. Vital for climbing and spelunking.

supplies.name: Map
supplies.description: Unmarked for now, but with time, you may be able to map out your surroundings.

entries.text: Cnidathqua retreated to nurse its wounds.
many were sacrificed to Cnidathqua during the Carnevale.
the sun banished Cnidathqua into the depths.
the Excelsior is quiet, for now.
the investigators fled the scene of the crime.
the Rougarou continues to haunt the bayou.
the Rougarou is destroyed, and the curse is lifted.
the Rougarou escaped, and you embraced the curse.
you are aware of Xzharah’s plans.
the curse of slumber was lifted.
the Day of Reckoning is coming.

entries.masculine_text: #name# was pulled into the spectral realm.
entries.feminine_text: #name# was pulled into the spectral realm.

entries.text: the investigators are on Gavriella’s trail.
the investigators are on Jerome’s trail.
the investigators are on Valentino's trail.
the investigators are on Penny's trail.
Anette Mason is possessed by evil.
Anette taught you the spells of old.

the investigators asked Sanford for assistance.

Carl Sanford possesses the secrets of the universe.
the investigators are deceiving the Lodge.
the investigators discovered how to open the puzzle box..

the guardian of the trap emerged and was defeated.
the guardian of the trap emerged.
the investigators hid their knowledge of the coven.
the investigators were inducted into the Inner Circle.
the investigators escaped the spectral realm.

the investigators learned nothing of the Lodge’s schemes.
the investigators are members of the Lodge.
the investigators are never seen or heard from again.

the investigators survived the watcher’s embrace.

the true work of the Silver Twilight Lodge has begun.
